name: For a Better Country
description:
This game is a text-based simulation for a pure country management experience. Old-school mechanics are combined with up-to-date topics and clean graphics.

  • Make important decisions: Various issues such as death penalty, compulsory military service, abortion law, health system, military budget, LGBT rights, immigration policies, tax system and much more... There are approximately 250 problems that need to be solved.
  • Use the event and newspaper system: Follow the news of your country and make the right decisions based on what is happening.
  • Write your thoughts with Social Media: Communicate with your people through social media to give your opinion on various topics.
